TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IOrderedEnumerable`1<TElement> implements class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<!TElement>, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
Public Interface IOrderedEnumerable(Of TElement) Implements IEnumerable(Of TElement)
generic <typename TElement> public interface class IOrderedEnumerable : System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<TElement>

span.span: The type of the elements of the sequence.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此類型是可列舉，因為它繼承自。This type is enumerable because it inherits from . 擴充方法和類型的物件上運作。The extension methods and operate on objects of type . 型別的物件可以藉由呼叫其中一個主要排序方法，取得或，哪些傳回。An object of type can be obtained by calling one of the primary sort methods, or , which return an . 和，次級的排序方法，接著還會傳回型別的物件。 and , the subordinate sort methods, in turn also return an object of type . 這項設計可代表任何數目的連續呼叫或，其中每個呼叫會執行次級排序傳回前次呼叫的已排序資料。This design allows for any number of consecutive calls to or , where each call performs a subordinate ordering on the sorted data returned from the previous call. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何執行主要和次要上的排序字串陣列。The following example demonstrates how to perform a primary and secondary ordering on an array of strings. 它也會示範所產生是可列舉。It also demonstrates that the resulting is enumerable. [!code-csharp[System.Linq.IOrderedEnumerable#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.IOrderedEnumerable/CS/IOrderedEnumerable.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.IOrderedEnumerable#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.IOrderedEnumerable/VB/IOrderedEnumerable.vb#1)]

span.span: to sort the elements in descending order; to sort the elements in ascending order.

summary.span: 依據索引鍵，在 的項目上執行後續的排序。

span.span: Performs a subsequent ordering on the elements of an according to a key.

returns.span: 依據索引鍵排序其項目的 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法所提供的功能類似的係由或，取決於是否`descending`是`true`或`false`。The functionality provided by this method is like that provided by or , depending on whether `descending` is `true` or `false`. 兩者都執行類型的已排序的序列式次級順序。They both perform a subordinate ordering of an already sorted sequence of type . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用上執行 次要排序。The following code example demonstrates how to use to perform a secondary ordering on an .
